price: Allah bã Ya son bayyanãwa da mũnãna daga magana* fãce ga wanda aka zãlunta. Kuma Allah Yã kasance Mai ji, Masani.
arabic: ۞ لَّا يُحِبُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ بِٱلسُّوٓءِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ إِلَّا مَن ظُلِمَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعًا عَلِيمًا
footnotes: * Magana mummũna. Allah bã Ya son bayyana mugunyar magana, sai dai wanda aka zãlunta, yana iya kai ƙãra, kuma yana iya yin addu'a a kan wanda ya zãlunce shi. Sa'an nan ya shiga bayyanãwar abin da ake nufi da miyagun maganganu a cikin ãyõyin da suke bin wan nan.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yuḥibbu al-lahu al-jahra bil-sūi mina al-qawli illā man ẓulima wakāna al-lahu samīʿan ʿalīman
